meanings.definition: A person who is more hyper than others.
meanings.sent1: She is known as the hyperer in our group because of her energy.
meanings.sent2: The hyperer in the class always keeps everyone entertained.
meanings.sent3: The hyperer at the party was the first one on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: He was like a hyperer firework lighting up the room with his enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The hyperer of the team never seems to run out of energy.
